title: style pulled pork with spicy slaw
description: This recipe is perfect for when you have a gang of hungry mouths to feed because the oven does most of the work for you.
ingredients: 4cm/1½in fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
½ red cabbage, very thinly sliced
1 large carrot, cut into thin matchsticks
2 red chillies, finely chopped (seeds removed if you prefer less heat)
10-12 sesame seed buns, split open and toasted
